description.p: FendApp is a calculator for unit aware calculatons across a wide range of domains. It offers a range of features, including the ability to convert between hundreds of built-in units effortlessly.

With FendApp, you can perform arithmetic operations with arbitrary precision and seamlessly work with complex numbers. It has support for variables, various bases, and trigonometric functions enhances its versatility, and its unit-aware capabilities ensure accurate calculations by automatically handling derived units.
